reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived at 2am, used automatic check in, had a shower, and left in the morning. Room was clean and very warm. Showers were shared but again these were clean. It was incredibly quiet. Absolutely perfect for our needs as a quick stop over for the night.
reviews.title: Perfect for the night

likes.disliked: — It was completely out of the town and difficult to find on the gps
